author: charles
msg: Amended user mgmt proposal to reflect new mailet API.

author: charles
msg: Amended mailrepository proposal to use new Mailet API.

author: charles
msg: TLS adapted WARNING Handler does not work properly with TLS. Not for prodcution use.

author: serge
msg: Made 0 length passwords not allowed for administrator accounts, and made root's password zero length (so you must change it!).  Also added HostIsLocal check right after RecipientIsLocal and sends to error processor (because it's not to a valid account).

author: serge
msg: Was grabbing list of users are init time, rather than each service call.  This wasn't apparent in the old system because mailets and matchers weren't actually kept in memory (they were reinstantiated each call).
